website_summaries.verdict: A diaper bag that provides more space than the usual shoulder tote. Good way to carry everything you need.
pros: Features 12 pockets, including an insulated side pocket
Made with highly durable fabric that is resistant to the usual wear, along with spills, of childcare
Large interior space with side access panels makes it easier to find inside items more quickly
Included wipes case features easy pop-open technology
cons: Too large for a quick outing or trip to run errands

customer_reviews.title: Bad zippers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it would be a great 'manly' diaper bag for my husband. The material is durable and easy to clean; there is plenty of space and lots of pockets, but the zippers are terrible. First one I ordered, one zipper would jam and split open every single time you used it, luckily it wasn't the main pocket so we just didn't use that pocket while waiting for the replacement. When the replacement arrived one of the zippers stuck often but a little patience and it would work again but then it too started jamming and splitting. So I returned it and decided on a different backpack. Sad because I really liked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets, lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: My husband kept saying we needed to try out a diaper backpack because my bag seemed to weigh more than a baby so I finally ordered this one after researching several. We really like it. Lots of room and lots of pockets. We have 4 kids (6,4,2,newborn) and have no problems carrying all needed supplies such as diapers, pull-ups, snacks/drinks, etc, and it’s nice to have your hands free to hold a kid or two. :) The easily accessible wipes pocket is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: Good but some are defective
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are so many pockets which makes organizing so easy but mine came defective .. not one but TWO zippers wouldn't work. I ended up returning it and purchasing the all gray one and that one was MUCH better. Zippers work great on it! The other comment I have is even when the bag is completely empty, it isn't the lightest bag in the world ... probably because of all the layers and padding needed to make so many pockets. Either way, the replacement bag has been good. Just fair warning that you may get a defective one and need to exchange, BUT amazon does have wonderful customer service and doing that was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mingo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim as I was comparing travel diaper bags to take with on a long haul flight. Bag has nice pockets for pretty much all of the essentials one would carry on a long flight - the ipad fit nicely as did some bulky food items. The wipes pocket is VERY handy. The two sidepockets held a flask of hot water for formula and the bottles to make it in. The thermal pocket held a couple of "stay cold" items for the first leg, after which it became the pocket to hold an unfinished bottle while giving breaks to baby. The straps are well thought out - fit the back nicely so your hands were free.
customer_reviews.author: Miataki

customer_reviews.title: excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: So many pockets and spacious we have a place for everything! One side pocket has some insulation to it so works well with a bottle and ice pack. The diaper wipe easy access on the side is so convenient! This bag is comfortable to carry as a backpack to have both hands free for other tasks. Well made with great attention to detail (down to the zipper handles). Material is easy to wipe clean with damp cloth. Great look and function! Well worth the price. I would recommend this and i would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sh

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product, bottle pocket needs to be taller.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is heavy duty and has just the right amount of pockets. It fits comfortably on my shoulders. 4 stars because the bottle pocket needs to be taller, I can only fit one 8 ounce bottle in there without a cap on and I really struggle to get it zipped. 4 stars also because the wipe container that comes with the backpack broke within two days.
customer_reviews.author: The Cliftons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag!
customer_reviews.text: We got this bag because it is gender-neutral and it can be used for other things other than a diaper bag. But what my husband and I love most about this bag is that it's a backpack which is SO incredibly handy when you have a toddler to chase after. The pockets are well thought-out, it seems like there is a designed spot for everything that is meant for a baby. It's fantastic. We are happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HurstTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: After being around my sister and having to tote around a diaper bag for her kids I decided to get something a little more manly to use with my son. Not only does it look a lot better than a diaper bag, it works a lot better too! This bag has it all. It has so many places to put things while staying secure on your back when carrying it around. My fiance wasn't too thrilled about the way it said Jeep on it but after she used it she fell in love with it. It has so many compartments that she just leaves her purse at home and tucks away what she needs in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is by far the most durable I have had thus far! We had originally purchased one from Babies R Us and it seemed like a high quality bag but the zippers began to break after a month and a half. This bag is going on 4 months and still going strong! I would say we are pretty rough with these bags, as are most people, but it has taken a beating and still looks and functions great! I love the colors and all the pockets. Very convenient for everything baby needs and may need! When this one eventually needs replaced, you can bet I will be buying another! Highly recommend this Jeep backpack!
customer_reviews.author: framp

customer_reviews.title: LOADs of pockets!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to keep in the boot of my car packed with emergency kids things - change of clothes etc. It will also be used as an occasional Grandparents Diaper Bag when they look after my two little ones. I am really impressed at the quality of this rucksac and the number of separate pockets is excellent! I love pockets for organisation. Diving and rummaging around in a big sack is not for me. My wipes case seems sturdy and it functions as it should. The bag itself is quite light so even packed to the gunnels it's not weighty to carry around. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kittycat12

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this too long but it's already holding up better than the last two diaper bags I had. I LOVE all the pockets it has. One drawback is that the wipes case wasn't airtight I guess because our wipes dried out in there. Other than that, it's been great. The stroller clips on the top are also great to use on shopping carts. The pocket for bottles is insulated. And I gotta say it again...pockets galore! Lack of pockets is something I hated about every other diaper bag I looked at or owned. The back pack style makes it hands-free. Who doesn't like hands-free, right??
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: love the color and its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: At first i decided to just return this bag, but decided not to and i was right, it is awesome... so roomy and the good part is my husband likes it. So whenever we go to the zoo, mall or go to my girls appointment we usually just take this with us because there is enough room for my keys, and cellphone and my wallet. I love it! it is easy to use and yeah because its back pack i can hold my twin girls at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Askjok

customer_reviews.title: Not the best choice.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this backpack 3x and both side zipper pockets have split. By no means was the bag over filled. You'd expect a more durable product. I tried to lightly grease the zippers with WD40 in hopes it would right this issue. The included wipe holder also has issues opening and closing. Looks cute and a backpack is definitely the way to go with a newborn but when the zippers don't close its not very helpful - I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: We love this. We have two kids under two and ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this. We have two kids under two and we got this bag just for a vacation. It held all the baby things I needed and held 10bottle of water for us while we hiked. Held up very well. I don't plan on buying another diaper bag. My husband did break the wipe thing on the side before we even got off the plane but I took it out and just buy those Togo wipe packs and put those in the pouch and I like that more.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Overall good. Several small flaws
customer_reviews.text: Back pack is very comfortable on my shoulders. I have a bad back, so this is very important to me. The wipe case however dries out the wipes very fast. It isn't airtight. I also don't favor that the "wet" bag that it comes with is attached to the interior pocket by a tether and that the changing mat is so flimsy it doesn't even sit up in the back pack. Also the insulated pocket does not fit sippy cups or wide mouth bottles with fatter bodies. So I wish there was a mesh holder or something on the outside to slide a sippy in.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rearick

customer_reviews.title: Great value and buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Jeep product!! Lots of room for all baby’s needs and anything mom and dad need as well. Pockets for items easily stored. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Pups1517

customer_reviews.title: I really like this diaper bag however it is a really big ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diaper bag however it is a really big bag. I like all the compartments it has. Inside the big compartment it has 2 places to hold diapers and a small zipper compartment. The the 2 side compartments are big enough to hold bottles. Then there is a insulated compartment. The wipes container I took out and I put the flip top disposable wipes container in its place. The u shaped pocket is pretty deep. This bag can also attach to a stroller which is a plus. It's very comfortable to wear because it is very well padded in the straps and back area.
customer_reviews.author: TG82604

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for travelling with little ones
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly researched backpack diaper bags before purchasing this one. We toom our 3 year old and 10 month old son to Disneyland for the first time and this bag exceeded my expectations. I had more than enough room for clothes, snacks, diapers and the side wipe compartment is by far my favorite feature.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaKelley06

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept. Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack with lots of pockets and space. The zippers however are horrible and such cheap quality. *update* We've been using the diaper bag for two months now and the main zipper is almost impossible to use. My brother and sil have the same diaper bag and have also had it for 2 months and they have a pocket that won't even zip shut
customer_reviews.author: michelletmommyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart in less than a week - TWICE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it - the first one arrived in bad condition, showing signs of tear, so I ordered a replacement - the replacement was tearing apart after a week, so this is no coincidence. It's poorly constructed and it won't last. At least don't get it from here - the ones I saw at the store didn't look like they were falling apart, but I don't have first hand experience with these. I don't know why Amazon sells the crappy ones!
customer_reviews.author: Sunchette

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to have the first one replaced due to quality, and I feel this one still isn't as quality as it should be... But for the price it does it's job and I love all of the pockets! Update: the sewn zipper on the second bag I received came undone in the same place as the first after maybe a month. Over the course of a year the zippers are fraying and falling apart on pretty much every pocket. If I were to do it again I would spend more money and get a better bag.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Even though I like Jeeps, I would not get this again
customer_reviews.text: I actually changed my rating for this. I feel a backpack should last at least 5 years. Not only does the wipes compartment not fit any wipes packages but the zippers are now broken. It only was used in a minimal way and i had to throw it out. I used it for less than 2 years. Even though I like Jeeps, I would not get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great, not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing. It's got plenty of space for all your needs for a full day trip! However, the zipper's side fabric didn't last a week in our trip abroad. I admit, we pushed this bag to its limit, but that zipper failed miserably! I tried to get it fixed, but they all told me the fabric won't support stitches. If you're not going trekking with this bag, then this is the bag for you. If you're an adventurer like me, don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Ayman AlAnsari

customer_reviews.title: Seams are ripping in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Like it but its already ripping!!!! I have had this bag for almost 3 months, and three seams are already ripping! I havent even used it often, as I was on maternity leave for 2 months and stayed home majority of the time. I expected better quality from Jeep. I love the bag itself and all of the different pockets. ITs super convenient to throw on your back, and there is space for everything. Just watch out for the ripping. I am going to contact them this week and see if they will do anything about this. I will update when i do.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Pate

customer_reviews.title: The best diaper bag backpack, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: To simply state it, I love all the pockets. Excellent quality, thick durable, great zippers and pockets. The straps are comfortable. When comparing the fisher price back pack, which looks similar to this one the outside, this backpack has more pockets/compartments especially within the main large compartment. Very pleased with this product! I love that my husband isn't embarrassed carting it around... A definite plus!
customer_reviews.author: Biscuit090

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Diaper Bag For Both Men In Your Life
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. I was having a boy so I wanted no frills or girly looking things! I bought it so my boyfriend would feel manly carrying a diaper bag and boyish enough that it looks like a boys bag. It fits EVERYTHING and has been super sturdy. The only con is the wipes holder on the side dries out wipes super fast and so I don't even use it. But other than that its been all I needed it to be!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Missing the changing pad
customer_reviews.text: We love this diaper bag but had to return the first one ordered within the first few days because the seam was coming apart. Decided it was a fluke and returned and reordered. The second one was received without the changing pad. So far the diaper bag is holding up under use (it’s been a few weeks) and we are organized better because it’s a well laid out bag. Will plan contact seller for the changing pad...
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's plenty big enough to store all the necessary baby items. The changing pad is pretty thin, but not a big deal to me and the zippers do seem like they're not going to last very long. But I'm happy with it for what I paid. And my husband doesn't mind carrying it when he needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Stacee C. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I am not having any issues with the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I am not having any issues with the zippers or pockets. I am loving being hands free and all of pockets are great for organization. I am not using the wipes container since I can easily see that breaking, and just putting the wipes package in that pocket. I like that it can attach to the stroller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Golden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: I had a regular satchel type diaper bag and was tired of constantly looking thru it to find stuff. I bought this backpack about a month ago and love it. We're currently traveling with our 3 month old and this holds everything for everyday use as well as 13hr international flights. Favorite features: Insulated pocket to keep bottles warm,outer wipes pocket. Huge insize which fits entire formula container, extra clothes and 15/20 diapers. My husband loves it too because when I ask him to get something out, he knows extant what pocket holds what .
customer_reviews.author: irina tchoudovskaia

customer_reviews.title: Bought this backpack because I was sick of having my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack because I was sick of having my diaper bag weighing down one shoulder. I can just put this on my back and have my hands free. The big pocket is spacious and there are plenty of little pockets. I've noticed that the insulated pocket doesn't really keep liquids cold for too long so I wouldn't put milk in there on a long trip.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This item started off great...for about two months. After two months, the main compartment zippers stopped working. I would not expect the zipper to break after two months. I was completely disappointed on the quality because I can not use this back pack any longer. I think the functionality of the back pack definitely makes sense with one exception- my tall baby bottle (Dr Brown) does not fit into the thermal pocket well. I stopped using it as well because I was afraid the zipper would also break if I forced it.
customer_reviews.author: Kalisha Barrett

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I hope it holds up. It's lasted for two months with no issues yet. I use the pouch the disposable wipes come in from the store in the pocket as the wipes box that comes with the bag does not hold enough wipes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dramawaltz

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: It's roomy, which is great, but the access to the large main compartment makes it difficult to get to your stuff. The outside pockets are useful but make the bag bulky, it juts out and I was constantly knocking it into things when wearing it. The two side pockets are super convenient though, ones insulated and the others a wipes dispenser. My zipper started to pull away from the bag after about a months use. I wasn't impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasew

customer_reviews.title: It gets annoying to just get the zipper opened
customer_reviews.text: Cannot be operated by one hand ! Mostly we have one hand available with babies . It gets annoying to just get the zipper opened . Very hard material and hardly can fit 2 sets of clothes ( tiny ) and that's it. I would not recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Kln

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious!  Can fit all items including extra milk and bottle warmer
customer_reviews.text: LOVES this bag! Our previous diaper bag was a cute winning the pooh one from Walmart. Adorable, but not practical. Always had to rummage through the one giant pocket. Couldn't zip it because our things wouldn't fit (we take our milk and bottle warmer with us). But with this Jeep backpack diaper bag we can fit EVERYTHING. I also love how I don't have to search and search because every item has its own pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Paige W

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: Really good bag. We still use it as our main bag now. In hindsight, I don't think it's worth the price, but that's me. The little wipes carrier broke for us after about a month. Also I wish the cooler section is a little small, it won't really hold a bottle very easily, would be better if it were bigger. Other than those two things it's a great bag. LOTS of storage and compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Astin

customer_reviews.title: Straps too wide and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bag as I did love the color and pocket options but the straps were just too wide and uncomfortable. As a nursing mom I couldn’t carry this bag for more than a few minutes trying it on because it dug into my breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Angela

customer_reviews.title: Loving this
customer_reviews.text: First of all, everyone should own a diaper backpack. They are so much easier to carry than a traditional diaper bag. This backpack is very sturdy and comfortable. It is the perfect size, not too big, not too small. I have every pocket packed and it still is a comfortable weight. I love that it has padded straps and stroller loops. It has plenty of room for everything and more.
customer_reviews.author: smkindler

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year and a six month old. I need a bag with lots of pockets so that I can be a bit more organized. It has a lot of pockets but I think they are to narrow, and when you put things in these pockets, it takes away from the inside of the bag, making the space much smaller. The material inside the bag is also not strong so you won't want to stuff to much things or it will burst. The look is really nice and the outside looks strong. Amazon shipping was very fast and very we'll packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice construction, holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Nice construction, holds a lot, great for on the go since it’s a backpack. Wipes holder dried wipes out, better to put your own pack in.
customer_reviews.author: AZ24

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Recently had another child (now 2). I wanted something that I could carry both of their items in one bag. The pockets are ergonomically and numerous. Very happy with this bag, a little stiff when I first got it, I'm certain it will loosen up. Easy to have 2 kids' stuff on board and right where I can find everything, Full or empty, it seems to stand up on the solid base every time.
customer_reviews.author: howdi

customer_reviews.title: Nice material
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the material of this bag! The design is close to a lot of other cheaper alternatives (without the JEEP name) but there's a big difference in the material! So you are paying for a higher quality, not just a name brand!
customer_reviews.author: JNP

customer_reviews.title: Had to exchange the first one because the front pouch ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange the first one because the front pouch started peeling away at the stitching. Feel durable but the stitching is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zippers
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to like this bag - I did the research and unfortunately didn't heed the warnings of others regarding the zippers. I bought this in December and within a month 2 of the zippers have broken, as well as the clasp on the wipes case. The bag is a great size, lots of space and pockets, but the broken zippers are a real issue. I cannot recommend this bag and have returned mine to exchange for another model.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Husband
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want my husband to carry around a very girly diaper bag... He's got to keep some of his dignity, right? He was checking a few bags out and after he mentioned he liked this one, I ordered it for him and he loves it! So many compartments and very comfortable padded straps. I'm almost jealous with how much better organized this bag is than mine!
customer_reviews.author: Francy

customer_reviews.title: Also the bag material is very durable and it doesn't get dirty that fast
customer_reviews.text: A bit bulky but worth it buying. It has a lot of pockets that you can separate things. example separate pocket for ointments separate for long bottles, short bottles, pacifier also a small pocket for quarters to keep for quick parking. Also the bag material is very durable and it doesn't get dirty that fast.
customer_reviews.author: Adisa Hecimovic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. I threw away the crappy plastic wipe case though because it was useless. I also cut out the 'wet/soiled bag' inside because it got in my way all the time. Those were minor issues for me. I love all the pockets and convenience of clipping it to the stroller. The straps are easy to adjust to whoever is carrying it as well. Needless to say I like this much better than the traditional diaper bag I started out with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper backpack!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I was preparing for my 3rd child. I knew I did not want a regular diaper bag that would be in the way, constantly falling off my shoulder when I bent down. I found this backpack was was so excited to get it and when it arrived I was impressed. So many pockets for everything you could need and plenty of room to pack my babies things along with my 2 other kods things. Would ded recommend thia backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jsinnott64

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to any parent
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to any parent. Everything has a place and you dont have to worry about it falling off your shoulder. The wipe container is small and tears the wipes, but we took in out and just stick the pack of wipes that come with a lid in it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My second bag after 5 kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I did have zipper issues with the first one but it was after years of use. I get compliments all the time. I love the outside wipes compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is ok, I believe it is a copycat ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok, I believe it is a copycat of the cheap walmart bags though. This one looks almost identical, but costs much more and is a little too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Really annoyed, disappointed and ended up returning this smelly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and was really excited to start using it. However I got a very smelly bag that looked used and zipper was difficult to use. Also nothing was in the bag. Really annoyed, disappointed and ended up returning this smelly bag
customer_reviews.author: Far For

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dad diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Functional and great for dads who don't want to carry the girly diaper bags. The quality is decent so far in the 4 months that I've had it for my Fiance. The only thing that is kind of a negative is that there are too many small pockets that I forget about and aren't used properly.
customer_reviews.author: GumballWizard

customer_reviews.title: This bag has been amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We originally had just a regular old diaper bag from Walmart that served its purpose while my daughter was younger. Now that she is over a year old and has a sibling on the way we decided we needed to look for something that would work for two kids and all of the extra stuff. In this bag I cam fit her diapers plus some, wipes, sappy cup in the insulated pocket, and still have room for 3 extra outfits a baby doll and food with room to spare. Seriously awesome and I recommend it to everyone I meet with little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Laine

customer_reviews.title: Practical, Big Enough, Good Quality But Not the Stitchings
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy yet practical and easy to carry. Over time the stitching gives up specially on the top holder. The rest is well designed and fits most of the items you need. Size is big enough without becoming a burden.
customer_reviews.author: JPR

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made zippers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the idea and still use the backpack anyways, but unfortunately - as I've read in previous reviews - the zippers do break a lot... everything else is great, but the zippers will stop working after the first 2 weeks of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friends baby shower and packed full of goodies for the new daddy-to-be. He loved it. It has so many pockets and is very well made. I wish I had this when my son was a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Iannarelli

customer_reviews.title: Other than that - great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had mine for 5 months and the edges around the sipper are starting to fray! The zipper get caught all the time, making getting in the diaper bag with one hand difficult! Ususally have to tug, yank, go back and forth to jimmy the zipper loose. Other than that - great bag!
customer_reviews.author: JRMom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this diaper bag. Yes it's big, but there's a pocket for everything! It keeps everything very organized and with a 14 month old, I need to be able to find things quick! My favorite feature about this bag is the insulated bottle compartment. The built in wipes compartment is very handy also! It's extremely durable and perfect for the family on the go.
customer_reviews.author: loriann.14

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag! My husband is a Jeep guy so we HAD to get a Jeep diaper bag. The back pack style is great to give you two free hands with your little one. I love all of the pockets to keep things organized and easy to find. Wipes case on the side is also very convenient. So far it is holding up great, we have used it for 8 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack...lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack...lots of room and easy to access back storage. Side wipes pouch zipper broke first month.
customer_reviews.author: CrissyH

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift on the registry. The recipient had used one in a previous pregnancy and was looking forward to using this again. She said it was very durable and held everything easily. The backpack idea kept her hands free so she could deal with her little one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Deskins

customer_reviews.title: So worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because the bags people got us at our shower were bulky and inconvenient. This is light and holds a lot of stuff. I love that the wipes are on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jarosi

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying, Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! Has so many compartments and pockets! Comes with a wipes container & changing mat. It's Insulated. And very spacious, love it!
customer_reviews.author: JessNYC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers - didn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had this diaper bag for 9 months. At around 7 months, the first zipper (around the main compartment) started to tear away from the zipper lining at the corners. At around 8 months, the front zipper puckered and now remains open no matter if you "zip it closed". I was very happy with this purchase until these issues came up. Comfortable, so many pockets, lots of space, decent looking. I'm now shopping for a new diaper bag as it would cost me the same amount to have the zippers replaced.
customer_reviews.author: big green jeep

customer_reviews.title: jeeper
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted! Only thing we didn't care for waste wipes container it came with, it's not air tight so it kept drying out our wipes. So we just stopped using it. Other than that we love this diaper bag pack
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Yager

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag. Bigger than I expected and holds a ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. Bigger than I expected and holds a ton. The changing pad is pretty much worthless but can be easily replaced. One issue with one of the zippers catching a little but other than that, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Renae

customer_reviews.title: and were happy with it until we saw that the entire strap ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bag 5 months ago, and were happy with it until we saw that the entire strap is tearing away from the bag on the bottom, leaving a giant hole to the main compartment. Once that completely detaches, its going to be unuseable.Very disappointing that it didn't last longer with just regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!!! It's even easy to get stuff from The bottom of the bag the way everything is set up. (The zippers) I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Nic

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack rocks for a diaper bag. So many pockets and none of them interfere with the space in the others. It is more compact than my other bags, yet manages to miraculously hold more items. It's really great, really.
customer_reviews.author: diefroggy242

customer_reviews.title: I like it looks like a regular backpack and is
customer_reviews.text: been using it for the last 2 years when we had our second baby, really roomy and strong keeping all the things you need for a toddler and a baby. I like it looks like a regular backpack and is unisex
customer_reviews.author: aval1978

customer_reviews.title: but the material feels like great quality
customer_reviews.text: So many pockets! I have room for everything I want to tote around plus more. I just got it yesterday so I can't write about its durability, but the material feels like great quality! It's comfortable on my back and lightweight (I have it filled)!
customer_reviews.author: SBWilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack! Really love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack! Really love it! All pockets are useful. Very spacious inside - best buy for those who use bottle feeding and need to have bottles, formula and hot/cold water on the go, not speaking about diapers, cloths, clothes etc. Easy to clean, easy to attach to stroller - very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Chuyko

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and I think I'm taking it away....so much space!!!!! Love it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love all the compartments and gender neutral colors
customer_reviews.text: Love all the compartments and gender neutral colors. Can be worn on shoulders or attached to stroller. Roomy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag - it has all the features we were ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag - it has all the features we were looking for including the stroller straps. Super easy to use and much easier for when me or my husband take our 23 month old son out for the day without each other.
customer_reviews.author: Rupa L.

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great at keeping my hands free but I do have ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great at keeping my hands free but I do have a couple complaints. There is no place to store the changing mat which means that everytime you reach into the big pocket it's in the way. The large pocket is so deep and narrow that things disappear into its depths, never to be seen again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Even though the backpack is large enough (which is the only Pro) the build quality is very poor. The zippers break very easily and the durability of the product is very short. I bought it (twice) and they broke in just three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: A Vera

customer_reviews.title: ... with 3 children and this is BY FAR the best one I have ever seen or used
customer_reviews.text: I have used at least 3 diaper bags with 3 children and this is BY FAR the best one I have ever seen or used. The wipes on the outside are a deal breaker--quick access for sneezes and messes, not having to dig through the diaper bag to find wipes while holding up two tiny legs to change a diaper. The side pockets act as a trash can in our family and I love the top pocket for keys, pacifiers and my wallet. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JenT

customer_reviews.title: like all things Jeep these days
customer_reviews.text: Cheap construction, like all things Jeep these days. We have stopped using the pack. Zippers stick or bust, shoulder straps are coming off and it is much smaller than they make it seem in the ad. I can't suggest another pack, but don't get this one.
customer_reviews.author: CWM

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of diaper bags, wanted something different. Love this diaper backpack. It's wonderful. So many pockets, place for wipes. Cool area. Just love
customer_reviews.author: jenszamg

customer_reviews.title: Not as roomy as advertized
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a broken zipper. The room inside wasn't nearly as big as advertized. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would of found sooner! Love all the pockets and storage space. Having it attach to the stroller makes it very convenient to get to. Only small problem so far is the side wipe container, the lock button has popped off.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Loving the bag. Perfect diaper bag and style for baby boy and also for dad to hold. Love the baby wipe access, love that its a backpack easy to hold and hold baby at the same time. Real nice sturdy material. Getting it Monogrammed! :)
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: There is plenty of storage in this bag! Also, my husband has no problem wearing this opposed to my old Vera Bradly bag-- he wasn't too keen on the floral. Very handy having the wipes dispenser on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Sshields10

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have it already for three years and won't trade it for anything. I see they are a lot of knock offs that are smiliar but I rave about this product a lot. It's great for my husband and me so I can carry my daughters and any bags. Definitely would recommend or give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected. Works very well and bag has plenty of storage inside. I am 6'4" and bag feels small and somewhat tight on broad shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I love LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love LOVE this bag! So much better than what I was carrying around before. Pockets galore! No more digging around for stuff. The changing pad is a bit flimsy. And aa far as zipper issues ans tearing I havent experienced any.
customer_reviews.author: H. England

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this backpack
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack! So much better than the diaper bag I had. Extremely roomy and I especially like the easy access to the wipes. Great for on the go and all the daycare must haves for my 2 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: leasenkay

customer_reviews.title: Big and holds tons!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this! It's huge! It fit everything even when I overpacked like a ftm.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag. Lots of pockets for organization and plenty of space for everything. Dad is happy to carry it too making it the perfect diaper bag for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: We love it. We have twins and everything fits in ...
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is huge. We love it. We have twins and everything fits in it and it's easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the Dad, Mom took over since it is so handy!!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag the comer I've been looking for to match my baby stroller 😍
customer_reviews.author: cindy umanzor

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching inside the pockets
customer_reviews.text: The zippers keep getting hung up on threads..I've had to trim the insides of multiple pockets. This affects the integrity of the stitching so may end up tearing loose at some point. Not just one pocket either. Otherwise, I like it...very roomy and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: DBABY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband for father's day and he loves it! I even prefer to take it over my Coach diaper bag somedays ;) The fact that it says Jeep makes it even better ;)
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Best you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Last almost two years and we are still using it. This thing is built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, poor warranty, overall disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality - zip split on first use, lining in pockets has come away after 10 weeks use and plastic wipes container does not keep wipes wet, they dry out very quickly. Unfortunately, after reading other reviews, I'm not confident that we will have any luck with the warranty on this item. Knowing what I know now, I would definitely buy a different bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not Jeep
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine. It's not the same as pictured. Has different stitching on the front and doesn't say Jeep. So I take it Amazon sent me a cheap off brand. So far I like all the pockets, but I'm skeptical about using it since it's not even the Jeep brand I purchased. May send back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L McKeough

product_meta.title: Jeep Perfect Pockets Baby Diaper Bag Backpack - Small Bag with 12 Roomy Pockets for The Ultimate Organizer - Includes Wipe Holder and Wipeable Changing Pad - Grey and Green
product_meta.description: Jeep perfect pockets back pack diaper bag combines ultimate organization with clean, handsome styling. 12 pockets make for storage heaven when on the go with baby. Stash pacifiers, creams, keys, and diapers in the small zippered pockets throughout the bag, and larger items like toys, and clothes in the spacious main compartment. Bottles stay fresh in the insulated side pocket. This jeep diaper bag features a hard wipes case with easy pop open feature for quick access to baby wipes. Choose between 2 hands free carrying options, padded shoulder straps or stroller loops. Padded back panel for added comfort.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars392 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
